name: Dehydrating while we drown
description: Rainfall patterns have become highly unpredictable as last drought and record rainfall demonstrates. The only reason to install water saving systems is to get BREEAM points and meet water regulations, which only apply to new homes. What else can be done to reduce water use?

speakers.name: Trevor Bishop
speakers.occupation: Head of Water Resources, Environment Agency

speakers.name: Mark Pendlington
speakers.occupation: Director, Anglian Water Regional Group; and Chairman, New Anglia's Green Economy Pathfinder Board

speakers.name: Professor Chris Spray
speakers.occupation: Chair, Water Science and Policy at UNESCO Centre, University of Dundee
